message.body: Sorry it took me so long to text back! Lost track. Amber was totally fine - if they have issues with her that's truly their issue. How's Christmas?
No worries! I was really tired yesterday but I feel beTter today. Ging was actually really good - we cuddled, guess I needed that. Y tu mamacita??
You and tim are welcome to come over later tonight. I really wanna watch the movie sleepy beauty - its supposed to be ReAL good
Ging was good? Christmas is good. Two today! Feeling real fulllllll. I'll definitely stop over. Not sure about Tim. Can't touch Campbell christmas!
Ginger, also known as Ging lol. Ok well im going to jump in the tub with gbo but when I get out u should def come over. MOVIE NIGHT
Oh that's cool, still at georgia's
I'm free! Let me know when you want me
Ok! Be there in a few
